page.title: 08EDUCATION
page.content: {Kilbroney Primary School}is situated on the Cloughmore Road,Rostrevor. A furthur Education Centre is on the same site.The site was originally a market garden. It is a red brick building built in 1972.It is got two class rooms with adjoining cloak rooms and stores.There is a dining hall which is also used for dancing and physical education and T.V. programmes.There is a P.E.store off the hall.The school kitchen is next to the hall with a hatch to serve the school meals,MrsJ.Coffey is the principal teacher.MrsJ.Coffey came to Kilbroney in 1979.MrsD.Moorehead is the assitant teacher.MrsM.Clements is the school secretary.MrsM.Rogan is the cook and MrsF.Farrell is the caretaker.
